mapper.insert: insert into tbl_boardadmin ( code , reply , answer , editor , attach , Declar , auth , Title , writer , day , ip ) Values ( BoardAdmin_seq.nextval, #{reply} , #{answer} , #{editor} , #{attach} , #{declar} , #{auth} , #{title} , #{writer} , sysdate , #{ip} )
mapper.select: select * from tbl_boardadmin order by code desc
mapper.update: update tbl_boardadmin set reply=#{reply} , answer=#{answer} , editor=#{editor} , attach=#{attach} , Declar=#{declar} , auth=#{auth} , Title=#{title} , UPDATER = #{writer}, UPDATEDATE = sysdate, ip= #{ip} Where code = #{code}
